Docs.param: The name of the resource group.
The name of the API Management service.

Quota counter key identifier.This is the result of expression defined in counter-key attribute of the quota-by-key policy.For Example, if you specify counter-key="boo" in the policy, then it’s accessible by "boo" counter key. But if it’s defined as counter-key="@("b"+"a")" then it will be accessible by "ba" key
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: Lists a collection of current quota counter periods associated with the counter-key configured in the policy on the specified service instance. The api does not support paging yet.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the operation returned an invalid status code
Thrown when unable to deserialize the response
Thrown when a required parameter is null

Docs.param: The name of the resource group.
The name of the API Management service.

Quota counter key identifier.This is the result of expression defined in counter-key attribute of the quota-by-key policy.For Example, if you specify counter-key="boo" in the policy, then it’s accessible by "boo" counter key. But if it’s defined as counter-key="@("b"+"a")" then it will be accessible by "ba" key
The value of the quota counter to be applied to all quota counter periods.
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: Updates all the quota counter values specified with the existing quota counter key to a value in the specified service instance. This should be used for reset of the quota counter values.
